Articles.Content:
I'm having trouble getting my HOTAS to work in game.

I seem to be having multiple problems here. 

  1. I went through the input settings and first off it was only reading the axe on my stick, it wouldn't even pick up my rudder pedals or my throttle, both of which work fine in KSP1.  It did read the buttons on both my stick and throttle though.
  2. it would only let me set inputs in one direction.  For example, I would pull the stick back to set pitch up, it would flash pitch down for a split second, but before I could move the stick it would close the window and set pitch down to stick up as well.  This seemed to happen with both axis moves and button presses on any bi-directional command, the only times it would let me set both directions was with the keyboard.
  3. I tried the second tutorial to test my controls and it wasn't reading inputs at all, this may be related to problem two.

 

Edited February 25, 2023 by Capt. Hunt
added tag
I found the Private Division support page and posted these bugs there.
